title: Captured
description: ***Note: This book is no longer available for purchase. Please refer to Captured by the Billionaire (The Complete Series) for this story. If you are interested in this title, please contact the author directly at juliasykes193@gmail.com***When Jake Cleary insists on taking Mallory on an impromptu trip to Venice, she tries her best to resist him. But she made a promise to go out with him, and Jake relentlessly holds her to it. Despite her protests, Mallory finds herself whisked away on his private jet.The more time Mallory spends with Jake, the more she comes to know the man behind the cocky fa√ßade. She finds herself inexorably drawn to him, but will she bolt when he reveals his kinky sexual desires?Approx. 7,300 words
author: Julia Sykes
